Sentencas: Pre-treated LSGM starting powders decrease in particle size, leading to an increase in the LSGM relative density and electric conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation and performance of large-area La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The starting powders are ball-milled with the assistance of absolute ethanol to reduce the particle size, dried ultrasonically to prevent the agglomeration of the powders and pre-calcined and re-balled to increase the rate of grain growth.
Titulo: Preparation and performance of large-area La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: These improvements make it possible to obtain single phase LSGM powders with small particle size at the calcination temperature of 1300 degrees
Titulo: Preparation and performance of large-area La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: C. A large-area (9 cm x 9 cm) LSGM electrolyte substrate has been prepared successfully by tape casting from these powders.
Titulo: Preparation and performance of large-area La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The LSGM electrolyte exhibits a dense structure, the relative density reaches 96%, and the electrical conductivity is 0.08 S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C. (C) 2010
Titulo: Preparation and performance of large-area La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell
